scripts.all-tests-localhost: tsc && env NODE_ENV=localhost npm run launch-all-tests
scripts.all-tests-dev: tsc && env NODE_ENV=development npm run launch-all-tests
scripts.load-test-position-snapshots-with-25-ope: tsc && node node_modules/artillery/bin/artillery run -o test-position-snapshots-with-25-operators-200-taxis.report.json src/taxiPositionSnapShots/loadTests/test-position-snapshots-with-25-operators-200-taxis.yaml && node node_modules/artillery/bin/artillery report -o test-position-snapshots-with-25-operators-200-taxis.report.html test-position-snapshots-with-25-operators-200-taxis.report.json
scripts.load-test-position-snapshots-with-50-ope: tsc && node node_modules/artillery/bin/artillery run -o test-position-snapshots-with-50-operators-200-taxis.report.json src/taxiPositionSnapShots/loadTests/test-position-snapshots-with-50-operators-200-taxis.yaml && node node_modules/artillery/bin/artillery report -o test-position-snapshots-with-50-operators-200-taxis.report.html test-position-snapshots-with-50-operators-200-taxis.report.json
scripts.load-test-300-realtime-booking: tsc && node node_modules/artillery/bin/artillery run -o test-300-realtime-booking.report.json src/taxis/loadTests/test-300-realtime-booking.yaml && node node_modules/artillery/bin/artillery report -o test-300-realtime-booking.report.html test-300-realtime-booking.report.json
scripts.load-test-1200-realtime-booking: tsc && node node_modules/artillery/bin/artillery run -o test-1200-realtime-booking.report.json src/taxis/loadTests/test-1200-realtime-booking.yaml && node node_modules/artillery/bin/artillery report -o test-1200-realtime-booking.report.html test-1200-realtime-booking.report.json
scripts.load-test-300-realtime-booking-no-destin: tsc && node node_modules/artillery/bin/artillery run -o test-300-realtime-booking-no-destination.report.json src/taxis/loadTests/test-300-realtime-booking-no-destination.yaml && node node_modules/artillery/bin/artillery report -o test-300-realtime-booking-no-destination.report.html test-300-realtime-booking-no-destination.report.json
scripts.load-test-1200-realtime-booking-no-desti: tsc && node node_modules/artillery/bin/artillery run -o test-1200-realtime-booking-no-destination.report.json src/taxis/loadTests/test-1200-realtime-booking-no-destination.yaml && node node_modules/artillery/bin/artillery report -o test-1200-realtime-booking-no-destination.report.html test-1200-realtime-booking-no-destination.report.json
scripts.load-test-taxi-position-snapshot-data-du: tsc && node node_modules/artillery/bin/artillery run -o test-taxi-position-snapshot-data-dump.report.json src/taxiPositionSnapshotDataDumps/loadTests/test-taxi-position-snapshot-data-dump.yaml && node node_modules/artillery/bin/artillery report -o test-taxi-position-snapshot-data-dump.report.html test-taxi-position-snapshot-data-dump.report.json
scripts.load-test-taxi-grid: tsc && node node_modules/artillery/bin/artillery run -o test-taxi-grid.report.json src/taxis/loadTests/test-taxi-grid.yaml && node node_modules/artillery/bin/artillery report -o test-taxi-grid.report.html test-taxi-grid.report.json
scripts.load-test-ping-1800-rpm: node node_modules/artillery/bin/artillery run -o ping-1800-rpm.report.json src/ping/ping-1800-rpm.loadTest.yaml && node node_modules/artillery/bin/artillery report -o ping-1800-rpm.html ping-1800-rpm.report.json
scripts.lint: npm run prettier && npm run tslint
scripts.lint-fix: npm run prettier-fix && npm run tslint-fix
scripts.osrm-random-montreal-car-route-5rps: tsc && node node_modules/artillery/bin/artillery run -o osrm-random-montreal-car-route-5rps.report.json src/osrm/osrm-random-montreal-car-route-5rps.yaml && node node_modules/artillery/bin/artillery report -o osrm-random-montreal-car-route-5rps.report.html osrm-random-montreal-car-route-5rps.report.json
